title: double RP
body: it said the double RP weekend is now but it says the normal RP amounts in the purchase RP tab, do i get it now or wait till it says the double RP amount?

replies.body: I haven't seen anything about a double RP event going on, do you have a link for that?  There is a [double IP weekend](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions), and that can be accrued simply through playing matchmade games.  Let me know if that clears things up!
